channel.title: Is there anyway I can get a mass detecor put into my server?
channel.description:
is there anyway I can get a mass detecor put into my server? because I want to know who is massing and who is not so I can ban people without having to play games.. I want it so say something like this.. [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/massingpic.jpg[/img] people are abusing there privalage in my server so I wanted to add this can I do this or do I need to have a client? woot! my 100th post
--Mupescape

item.title: Is there anyway I can get a mass detecor put into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

dude you got to 100 posts by asking for help rofl

and why dont you just but a block that makes it were they cant hit but 1 time every 3 seconds?

Just because I got 100+ post don’t mean I know didley squat I just like to hang out on these forums alot and see if I can learn something new or if I don’t. and I don’t know how to put a block that makes it were they cant hit but 1 time every 3 seconds so I would apreciate help Thanks
–Mupescape[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 04:37:49 AM[/size][hr]so anyoneknow how to put a block?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 07:14:16 AM[/size][hr]Anyone know??

Read full topic
